title: Box, early–mid-17th century
creditline: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: Rectangular box, probably a missal case, of red velvet embroidered in gold in high relief in a strap work pattern with stylized floral motifs. One side is hinged and fastened with small silver hooks. Silver eyelets on the end for cord handles.

tombstone.epitaph:
Box, early–mid-17th century.
early–mid-17th century. Medium: silk, metal
Technique: embroidered. Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf. 1962-58-13.
